00010 void set_rf_single(Grid1D& rf, Grid1D& Yrf, double harmonic)
00011 {
00012  int j;
00013  int dimx=rf.get_size();
00014  double dx=rf.get_dz();
00015  double circum=dimx*dx;
00016  for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00017   {
00018    rf[j]=-sin(2.0*PI*harmonic*rf.z[j]/circum);
00019    Yrf[j]=(circum/(2.0*PI*harmonic))*cos(2.0*PI*harmonic*rf.z[j]/circum)-(circum/(2.0*PI*harmonic));
00020   }
00021 }

00027 void set_rf_dual(Grid1D& rf, Grid1D& Yrf, double harmonic)
00028 {
00029  int j;
00030  int dimx=rf.get_size();
00031  double dx=rf.get_dz();
00032  double circum=dimx*dx;
00033  for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00034   {
00035    rf[j]=-sin(2.0*PI*harmonic*rf.z[j]/circum)+0.5*sin(4.0*PI*harmonic*rf.z[j]/circum);
00036    Yrf[j]=(circum/(2.0*PI*harmonic))*cos(2.0*PI*harmonic*rf.z[j]/circum)-(circum/(2.0*PI*harmonic))
00037         -0.5*(circum/(4.0*PI*harmonic))*cos(4.0*PI*harmonic*rf.z[j]/circum)-0.5*(circum/(4.0*PI*harmonic));
00038   }
00039 }

00041 void set_rfamplitude(double voltage0, Grid1D& rf)
00042 {
00043         int dimx=rf.get_size();
00044         for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00045                 rf[j]=voltage0*rf[j];
00046 }

00053 double match_elliptic(Grid1D& rf, Grid1D& Yrf, double zm2, double mom_spread, 
00054         double Zs, double Np, double beta0, double eta0, double charge, double mass)
00055 {
00056   int j,k; 
00057   double density0=0.0, f0=0.0;
00058   double dx=rf.get_dz();
00059   int dimx=rf.get_size();
00060   double delta_v=-eta0*beta0*clight*mom_spread; 
00061   double circum=dimx*dx;
00062   double gamma0=1.0/sqrt(1.0-beta0*beta0);
00063   double Y0=Yrf.get_grid_lin(zm2);
00064   double tem=0.0, um=0.0;
00065   
00066    // init distf
00067   int dimv=160;
00068   Grid2D distf_tmp(dimx,dimv,dx,4.0*delta_v/dimv);
00069   distf=distf_tmp;
00070    
00071   // normalize bunch profile 
00072   for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00073     {
00074      tem=Yrf.get_grid_lin(Yrf.z[j])-Y0;
00075      if( tem*Y0 < 0.0 ) um+=tem*dx;
00076     }
00077    
00078   // max. line density and peak dist. function 
00079   density0=-Np*Y0/um;
00080   f0=2.0*density0/(PI*delta_v);
00081  
00082   // space charge contribution 
00083   double voltage_s=charge*beta0*clight*circum/(2.0*PI)*Zs*Np/um;
00084 
00085   // total voltage amplitude:
00086   double voltage0=(mass*gamma0*circum*pow(delta_v,2))/
00087     (2.0*charge*eta0*Y0)+voltage_s;
00088 
00089   /*
00090   cout << "Voltage_sc:" << voltage_s << endl;
00091   cout << "Voltage:" << voltage0 << endl;
00092   cout << "f_s:" << sqrt(fabs(eta0)*voltage0*charge
00093                         /(2.0*PI*pow(circum,2)*mass*gamma0)) << endl;
00094   cout << "Sigma:" << voltage_s/voltage0/(1.0-voltage_s/voltage0) << endl;      
00095   */
00096 
00097   // init distribution function:
00098   for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00099       for(k=0; k<dimv; k++)
00100         {       
00101          tem=1.0-Yrf[j]/Y0-pow(distf.y[k]/delta_v,2);
00102          if ( tem > 0.0 ) distf[j*dimv+k]=f0*sqrt(tem);
00103          else tem=0.0;
00104         } 
00105 
00106   return voltage0;  
00107 }

00120 double match_elliptic_with_hole(Grid1D& rf, Grid1D& Yrf, double zm2, double mom_spread, 
00121         double Zs, double Np, double beta0, double eta0, double charge, double mass, double zh)
00122 {
00123   int j,k;  
00124   double density0, f0, fh, delta_v_h;
00125   double dx=rf.get_dz();
00126   int dimx=rf.get_size();
00127   double delta_v=-eta0*beta0*clight*mom_spread;
00128   double circum=dimx*dx;
00129   double gamma0=1.0/sqrt(1.0-beta0*beta0);
00130   double YRFm=Yrf.get_grid_lin(zm2);
00131   double YRFh=Yrf.get_grid_lin(zh);
00132   double Yfunc, Ym, Yh;
00133   double tem=0.0, um=0.0, uh=0.0;
00134 
00135   // init distf
00136   int dimv=160;
00137   Grid2D distf_tmp(dimx,dimv,dx,4.0*delta_v/dimv);
00138   distf=distf_tmp;
00139 
00140   for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00141     {
00142      tem=Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[j])-YRFm;
00143      if( tem*YRFm < 0.0 && distf.x[j] <= zm2 )
00144       um+=tem*dx;
00145     }
00146    
00147    for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00148     {
00149      tem=Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[j])-YRFh;
00150      if( tem*YRFh < 0.0 && distf.x[j] <= zh )
00151       uh+=tem*dx;
00152     }
00153 
00154    // flat line density:
00155    density0=Np/(um-uh)*(YRFh-YRFm);
00156 
00157   // space charge contribution without hole
00158   double Npnew=Np/(1.0-uh/um);
00159   double voltage_s=charge*beta0*clight*circum/(2.0*PI)*Zs*Npnew/um;
00160 
00161   // space charge contribution with hole
00162   voltage_s*=(1.0-YRFh/YRFm);
00163 
00164   // total voltage amplitude:
00165   double voltage0=(mass*gamma0*circum*pow(delta_v,2))/
00166     (2.0*charge*eta0*YRFm)+voltage_s;
00167 
00168   cout << "Voltage_sc:" << voltage_s << endl;
00169   cout << "Voltage:" << voltage0 << endl;
00170   cout << "f_s:" << sqrt(fabs(eta0)*voltage0*charge
00171                         /(2.0*PI*pow(circum,2)*mass*gamma0)) << endl;
00172 
00173   double YmdYh=(1.0-voltage_s/voltage0)*YRFm/YRFh+voltage_s/voltage0;
00174 
00175   // init distribution without hole:
00176 
00177   f0=2.0/PI*density0/delta_v*1.0/(1.0-1.0/YmdYh);
00178   Ym=(1.0-voltage_s/voltage0)*YRFm+voltage_s/voltage0*YRFh;
00179   Yh=YRFh;
00180 
00181   for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00182       for(k=0; k<dimv; k++)
00183         {
00184          if( distf.x[j] > zh || distf.x[j] < -zh )
00185            Yfunc=(1.0-voltage_s/voltage0)*Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[j])
00186            +voltage_s/voltage0*Yrf.get_grid_lin(zh);
00187          if( distf.x[j]<= zh && distf.x[j] >= -zh )
00188            Yfunc=Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[j]);
00189          tem=1.0-Yfunc/Ym-pow(distf.y[k]/delta_v,2);
00190          if ( tem > 0.0 && distf.x[j] <= zm2 ) distf[j*dimv+k]=f0*sqrt(tem);
00191          else tem=0.0;
00192         } 
00193 
00194   
00195   // now the hole:
00196 
00197   // determine delta_v_h:
00198   tem=2.0*charge*eta0*voltage0/(circum*mass*gamma0)*YRFh;
00199   //if ( tem >= 0.0)
00200   delta_v_h=sqrt(abs(tem));
00201   //else { cout << "delta_v_hole < 0.0" << endl; exit(0); }
00202   if (delta_v_h >0.0)
00203     fh=2.0/PI*density0/delta_v_h*1.0/(YmdYh-1.0);
00204   
00205 
00206   // substract hole
00207    for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00208       for(k=0; k<dimv; k++)
00209         {
00210          tem=1.0-Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[j])/Yh-pow(distf.y[k]/delta_v_h,2);
00211          if ( tem > 0.0 && distf.x[j] <= zh ) distf[j*dimv+k]-=fh*sqrt(tem);
00212          else tem=0.0;
00213         }
00214  
00215   cout << "Sigma:" << voltage_s/voltage0/(1.0-voltage_s/voltage0) << endl;      
00216         
00217   return voltage0;  
00218 
00219 }

00226 double match_gauss(Grid1D& rf, Grid1D& Yrf, double zm2, double mom_spread, 
00227         double Zs, double Np, double beta0, double eta0, double charge, double mass)
00228 {
00229         
00230         // init elliptic distf 
00231         double V0=match_elliptic(rf,Yrf,zm2,mom_spread,Zs,Np,beta0,eta0,charge,mass);
00232         
00233         int j,k;
00234         double dx=rf.get_dz();
00235         double dv=distf.get_dy();
00236         int dimx=distf.get_NX();
00237         int dimv=distf.get_NY();
00238         double circum=dimx*dx;
00239         double delta_v=-eta0*beta0*clight*mom_spread;
00240         double gamma0=1.0/sqrt(1.0-beta0*beta0);
00241         
00242         vektor ldy_0(dimx); 
00243         vektor ldy_1(dimx);
00244         vektor ldy_2(dimx);
00245         double tem=0.0;
00246         double mred=mass*gamma0/fabs(eta0);
00247         
00248         // calculate rms velocity of elliptic distribution
00249         double v2rms = 0.0;
00250         for(int k=0; k<dimv; k++)
00251                 for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00252                         v2rms+=pow(distf.y[k],2)*distf[j*dimv+k]*dx*dv/Np;
00253         double vrms=sqrt(v2rms); // vm/sqrt(5.0); 
00254         
00255         // line density from elliptic f0:
00256 
00257         for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00258         {
00259                 ldy_0[j]=0.0;
00260                 for(k=0; k<dimv; k++)
00261                    ldy_0[j]+=distf[j*dimv+k]*dv;
00262                 ldy_1[j]=ldy_0[j];
00263         }
00264         
00265         // line density iteration:
00266         
00267         for (int it=0; it<30; it++)
00268         {       
00269         
00270         // new line density:
00271         
00272         for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00273                 {
00274                  ldy_2[j]=exp(charge*V0*Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[j])/(mred*circum*pow(vrms,2)))
00275                         *exp(-pow(charge,2)*beta0*clight/(mred*2.0*PI*pow(vrms,2))*Zs*((1.0/3.0)*ldy_0[j]+(2.0/3.0)*ldy_1[j]));
00276                 }
00277         
00278         // normalize new line density:
00279         
00280         tem = 0.0;
00281         for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++) 
00282                         tem+=ldy_2[j]*dx;
00283         for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00284                         ldy_2[j]*=Np/tem;
00285         
00286         // update old line densities
00287         
00288         for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00289           {     
00290                         ldy_0[j]=ldy_1[j];
00291                         ldy_1[j]=ldy_2[j];
00292           }
00293          
00294         }
00295         
00296        // new f with space charge:
00297        
00298        for(j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00299                 for(k=0; k<dimv; k++)
00300                         distf[j*dimv+k]=ldy_1[j]/(sqrt(2.0*PI)*vrms)*exp(-0.5*pow((distf.y[k])/vrms,2));
00301                         
00302       return V0;  
00303 }

00305 
00306 void cut_distribution(Grid1D& Yrf, double voltage0, double charge, double meff, double zcut)
00307 {
00308  int i,j;
00309  int dimx=distf.get_NX();
00310  int dimv=distf.get_NY();
00311  double dx=Yrf.get_dz();
00312  double circum=dimx*dx;
00313  double Ycut=Yrf.get_grid_lin(zcut);
00314  
00315  for(i=0; i<dimx; i++)
00316    for(j=0; j<dimv; j++)
00317         if( (meff*circum/(2.0*charge*voltage0))*pow(distf.y[j],2)-Yrf.get_grid_lin(distf.x[i]) > -Ycut )  
00318            distf(i,j)=0.0;
00319  
00320 }

00324 
00325 void matchPIC(vektor& x, vektor& dp, double beta0, double eta0, long* d)
00326 {       
00327   double xran, vran, fran;
00328   double fmax=0.0, ftem;
00329   int dimx=distf.get_NX();
00330   int dimv=distf.get_NY();
00331   double xmax=-distf.get_beginx();
00332   double vmax=-distf.get_beginy();
00333   
00334   // find fmax:
00335   for(int j=0; j<dimx; j++)
00336     for(int l=0; l<dimv; l++)
00337       {
00338        ftem=distf(j,l);
00339        if (ftem > fmax) fmax=ftem;
00340       } 
00341 
00342    for (int j=0 ; j < x.size() ; j++)
00343          {
00344          do { xran = (2.0 * ran1(d) - 1.0)*xmax ;  
00345              vran = (2.0 * ran1(d) - 1.0)*vmax ;
00346          fran = ran1(d)*fmax;              
00347          } while (fran > distf.Grid2PIC(xran,vran)) ;
00348                
00349           dp[j]   =  -vran/(eta0*beta0*clight);
00350           x[j] = xran;
00351       }
00352 }
